name: Owl Drink Coasters - Set of 5
description:
For little ones, using a fancy coaster probably isn't number one on their priority list. Give them a set of Zoople coasters and they'll never look back.

These adorable coasters are rubber-backed so they won't slip and slide on your table top. Use them to protect your furniture from drips and drops.

Size:
3 1/2" diameter
1/8" thick

Washing (for longest life):
Gentle hand wash
Do not use any harsh cleaners or abrasive materials

***************************************************************************************

Illustrations and original design © Lindsay Johnston / Zooples & Co ™

name: O is for Owl in a Tree - Art Print 8" x 10"
description:
A beautiful illustration, this fine art print will look fabulous by itself or with other prints from the series. Kids and adults alike love these whimsical little critters called Zooples, and you will too!

Printed on premium archival paper with premium archival inks, this print will last a lifetime without losing its luster and fading. The print measures 8" x 10" and is printed to the edge so that there is no white border showing.

*Frame not included

name: Owl Canvas Print 10" x 10"
description:
This beautiful fine canvas print will look absolutely fabulous hanging on your child's wall. The picture is wrapped all the way around the edges so no frame is necessary, the print is ready to hang.

Size is 10" x 10" x 3/4"

Printed on premium satin canvas with archival inks. Print is water resistant and can be wiped down with a damp cloth for dusting purposes.

Each canvas print is signed and dated by the artist.

name: G is for Giraffe - Art Print 8" x 10"
description:
A beautiful illustration, this fine art print will look fabulous by itself or with other prints from the series. Kids and adults alike love these whimsical little critters called Zooples, and you will too!

Printed on premium archival paper with premium archival inks, this print will last a lifetime without losing its luster and fading. The print measures 8" x 10" and is printed to the edge so that there is no white border showing.

*Frame not included

name: Giraffe Notepad
description:
Keep your notes and thoughts straight on this adorable giraffe notepad. 25 pages that measure just over 4 in. x 6 in. with a cardboard backing. Notepad reads "NOTES!" at the top, and the giraffe is saying "HELLO!" in the bottom corner. Notepad color is baby blue with dark brown accents.

Notepad is handmade using commercial grade glue for a strong hold, trimmed edges and rounded the corners. Due to the handmade nature of the notepads, each one will vary slightly.
